completion.enter: Send {cmd} to confirm the prompt as the input
completion.exit: Send {cmd} to exit the completion session
completion.other: Input which not in above will be confirmed as the input
completion.timeout: Completion session timed out. Exited automatically

discord.ambiguous_command: {cmd} which have both Args and Option/Subcommand can make unintended consequences when you translate it to Discord slash-command
discord.ambiguous_subcommand: Subcommand {name} which have both Args and sub Option/Subcommand can make unintended consequences when you translate Alconna to Discord slash-command

error.discord_prefix: The Alconna obj must have '/' prefix when use to translate to Discord slash-command

extension.forbid_exclude: Extension which id starts with '!' cannot be excluded
extension.path_load: Value of {path} is not a subclass of Extension
extension.path_invalid: {path} is not a valid extension path

test.check_failed: Test failed: Arg {arg} of {cmd} expected {expected!r} but got {got!r}

help.list: View the list of supported languages
